search.description: Performs a search for documents from the given source.

find.description: Find the first occurrence of the pattern given as argument after the current cursor; discard sample if not found.

column.description: Create a column with the given name and display 'The Current Value' (the result of a .find, .match, or .get) in that column.

panel.description: Create an output panel to display the samples that reach to this point.
